channel.alreadyOwner: The player is already an owner of this channel.
channel.noOwner: The player is not an owner of this channel.
channel.ownerAdded: The player %%PLAYERNAME is now an owner of this channel.

database.backupDone: A backup has been created into the plugin folder.
database.backupFailed: An error has occurred while backing up.
database.deleteConfirm: You are about to delete the entire database. A backup will be created if you continue. You need to run this command again if you are sure that you want to delete the database.
database.purgeFailed: An error has occurred while purging the database.
database.restoreDone: The latest backup is successfully restored.
database.restoreFailed: An error has occurred while restoring latest backup.
database.convertConfirm: Are you sure you want change the database type to %%STORAGETYPE? A backup will be created if you continue. You need to run this command again if you want to continue.
database.convertSameType: Converting files failed. You are already on that storage type.

command.tooFewArguments: You did not give enough arguments.
command.onlyInGame: Only in-game users can use this command.
command.inferiorZero: Number can not be less than 0.
command.invalidSignLocation: Cannot create sign on your location.
command.activationMin: The activation time must be at least 50 ms.

interaction.cannotCreateSign: You cannot create a WirelessRedstone sign on this block.
interaction.destroyReceiverTorch: You cannot break my magic torches my friend!
interaction.channelCreated: You just created a new channel.
interaction.noTransmitters: No other transmitters found, switching off.
interaction.attachedToSign: You cannot destroy a block that is attached to a WirelessRedstone sign.
interaction.delayNumberOnly: The delay must be a number.
interaction.noChannelName: No channel name has been given.

permission.general: You do not have the permissions to do this.
permission.channelAccess: You do not have access to this channel.
permission.createChannel: You are not allowed to create a channel.
permission.createSign: You are not allowed to create this sign.
permission.destroySign: You are not allowed to destroy this sign.

messages.newUpdate: A newer version has been released! I highly recommand you download it now on %%URL
